concept.title: Cover Pages And Output Type Testing
concept.shortdesc: This PDF file demonstrates cover page generation and output type selection. Output type is controlled by the .ditaval filtering and output.type paramter.

conbody.p: This PDF file is generated by the following DITA-OT command-line parameter: -Dargs.filter=pdf5_ml_web.ditaval, -Doutput.type=web
This PDF file is generated by the following DITA-OT command-line parameter: -Dargs.filter=pdf5_ml_print_color.ditaval, -Doutput.type=print-color
This PDF file is generated by the following DITA-OT command-line parameter: -Dargs.filter=pdf5_ml_print_mono.ditaval, -Doutput.type=print-mono
